short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pinturillo 2 is a free online drawing game inspired by Pictionary

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In the game, you draw a picture based on the word that is given to you, or you guess what the other player is drawing. Draw your best picture to give others a chance to guess correctly
